doc.name: createWindow
doc.bottom_description: It is also possible to create a window in the global scope without defining a setup function.

arguments.description: Rendering mode, either `GL2D` or `GL3D`, by default `GL2D` is set.
arguments.name: [mode]

doc.name: frameRate
doc.bottom_description: If frame rate is called without an argument, it will return frame per seconds

doc.name: noLoop
doc.description:
Prevents lu5 from calling draw again.

When noLoop is called, the draw continues execution, but will not be called again.

doc.name: loop
doc.description: Allow lu5 to call the draw function.

doc.name: deltaTime
doc.description: Elapsed time since the last draw call in seconds

doc.name: width
doc.description: The window's width in pixels. If no window was created, this value is nil

doc.name: height
doc.description: The window's height in pixels. If no window was created, this value is nil

doc.name: windowResized
doc.description: Called when the window is resized
